title: Peppermint Patties
directions: In a mixer mix powdered sugar, coconut nectar, water, peppermint extract, shortening and a pinch of salt on medium speed until combined.
Once dough has formed, roll out between parchment paper to 1/4 inch thick, and place in freezer for 15 minutes, until firm.

Take dough out of the freezer and cut out rounds. Place rounds in the freezer for an additional 10 minutes. With leftover dough re-roll out and place in freezer, cut out rounds, and repeat until dough is all used.
Chocolate coating: melt chocolate in the microwave.
Take the peppermint rounds out of the freezer and place a small doll-up of chocolate on each and delicately coat the chocolate over the peppermint rounds.
ingredients: 2 1/2 Cup Powdered Sugar (*See substitution notes below)
